Scaled_Unscented_Transform_变尺度无味变换中的一些技术性推导

1. 符号约定

  • 粗体字母表示张量 (矢量和矩阵也都属于张量，矢量是一阶张量，矩阵是二阶张量)，或表示张量矩阵（元素都是同阶张量的矩阵）；
  • 带下标的非粗体字母表示对应张量的某分量，如 aijka_{ijk}aijk​ 是张量a\boldsymbol{a}a 的一个分量；
  • 张量矩阵的元素用带括号的上标指定，且由于张量矩阵的元素是张量，所以元素也表示成粗体，比如若A\boldsymbol{A}A是一个张量矩阵，则其第iii行第jjj列的元素表示为：A(ij)\boldsymbol{A^{(ij)}}A(ij)
  • 不加粗的大写字母表示传统的矩阵，加粗的大写字母表示该矩阵的张量形式，如MMM是矩阵，M\boldsymbol{M}M是二阶张量；
  • 如果两个张量直接连写在一起，表示两个张量的并积，如 ab\boldsymbol{ab}ab 表示a\boldsymbol{a}a 与 b\boldsymbol{b}b 的并积，特殊地， an\boldsymbol{a^n}an 表示aaa...a\boldsymbol{aaa...a}aaa...a 即 nnn 个 a\boldsymbol{a}a 的并积；
  • a⋅b\boldsymbol{a}\cdot\boldsymbol{b}a⋅b 表示张量 a\boldsymbol{a}a 与 b\boldsymbol{b}b 的点积，即a\boldsymbol{a}a 的最后基矢量与 b\boldsymbol{b}b 的第一基矢量进行缩并，展开式为： r=a⋅b=aijkblmeiejek⋅elem=aijkblmeiejδklem=aijkbkmeiejem=rijmeiejem\boldsymbol{r}=\boldsymbol{a}\cdot\boldsymbol{b}=a_{ijk}b_{lm}\boldsymbol{e}_{i}\boldsymbol{e}_{j}\boldsymbol{e}_{k}\cdot\boldsymbol{e}_{l}\boldsymbol{e}_{m}=a_{ijk}b_{lm}\boldsymbol{e}_{i}\boldsymbol{e}_{j}\delta_{kl}\boldsymbol{e}_{m}=a_{ijk}b_{km}\boldsymbol{e}_{i}\boldsymbol{e}_{j}\boldsymbol{e}_{m}=r_{ijm}\boldsymbol{e}_{i}\boldsymbol{e}_{j}\boldsymbol{e}_{m}r=a⋅b=aijk​blm​ei​ej​ek​⋅el​em​=aijk​blm​ei​ej​δkl​em​=aijk​bkm​ei​ej​em​=rijm​ei​ej​em​ ，r\boldsymbol{r}r 的阶数等于ab\boldsymbol{a}\boldsymbol{b}ab的阶数减2，用爱因斯坦求和约定来表示分量间的关系式为 rijm=aijkbkmr_{ijm}=a_{ijk}b_{km}rijm​=aijk​bkm​。传统矩阵的乘积就可以看做张量的点积，传统的矢量点积也是张量点积的一个特例；

为方便表示，再额外定义一些运算

  • 张量的并联式多重点积，a∗b\boldsymbol{a}*\boldsymbol{b}a∗b 表示张量 a\boldsymbol{a}a 与 b\boldsymbol{b}b 的并联式多重点积，以下简称多重点积（若不额外说明，文中提到的多重点积都是指并联式的），若r=a∗b\boldsymbol{r}=\boldsymbol{a}*\boldsymbol{b}r=a∗b ，a\boldsymbol{a}a 与 b\boldsymbol{b}b的阶数分别为ppp和qqq，其中p≥qp\ge qp≥q，则r\boldsymbol{r}r 就是a\boldsymbol{a}a 的最后qqq个基矢量与 b\boldsymbol{b}b 的qqq个基矢量分别依次缩并的结果，r\boldsymbol{r}r 的阶数为 ∣p−q∣|p-q|∣p−q∣（特殊地，若p=qp=qp=q即a\boldsymbol{a}a与b\boldsymbol{b}b同阶，则多重点积的结果退化为一个标量，切此时满足交换率）。比如若p=3,q=2p=3,q=2p=3,q=2，则以爱因斯坦求和约定来表示分量间的关系式为 ri=aijkbjkr_{i}=a_{ijk}b_{jk}ri​=aijk​bjk​。（如果是串联式的多重点积，则ri=aijkbkjr_{i}=a_{ijk}b_{kj}ri​=aijk​bkj​，但这里我们更多的使用前述的并联式）；
  • 张量矩阵的转置：设A\boldsymbol{A}A是一个张量矩阵，B=AT\boldsymbol{B}=\boldsymbol{A}^TB=AT，则A(ij)=B(ji)\boldsymbol{A^{(ij)}}=\boldsymbol{B^{(ji)}}A(ij)=B(ji)
  • 张量矩阵的乘法：与传统矩阵乘法格式基本一样。举例，设张量矩阵 C=AB\boldsymbol{C}=\boldsymbol{A}\boldsymbol{B}C=AB，则C(ij)=∑kA(ik)B(kj)\boldsymbol{C^{(ij)}}=\sum_{k}{\boldsymbol{A^{(ik)}}\boldsymbol{B^{(kj)}}}C(ij)=∑k​A(ik)B(kj)，需要强调的是，求和式中A(ik)\boldsymbol{A^{(ik)}}A(ik)与B(kj)\boldsymbol{B^{(kj)}}B(kj)的乘积指的是它们的并积。因此，若A\boldsymbol{A}A的元素是mmm阶张量，B\boldsymbol{B}B的元素是nnn阶张量，则它们的乘积C\boldsymbol{C}C的元素就是(m+n)(m+n)(m+n)阶张量。
  • 若A\boldsymbol{A}A是一个张量矩阵，b\boldsymbol{b}b 是一个张量，则A∗b\boldsymbol{A}*\boldsymbol{b}A∗b或b∗A\boldsymbol{b}*\boldsymbol{A}b∗A依然表示一个张量矩阵（或当b\boldsymbol{b}b与A\boldsymbol{A}A的元素同阶时，退化成传统标量矩阵），记为C\boldsymbol{C}C，则C(ij)=A(ij)∗b\boldsymbol{C^{(ij)}}=\boldsymbol{A^{(ij)}}*\boldsymbol{b}C(ij)=A(ij)∗b或C(ij)=b∗A(ij)\boldsymbol{C^{(ij)}}=\boldsymbol{b}*\boldsymbol{A^{(ij)}}C(ij)=b∗A(ij)

2. 标准正态分布的高阶中心矩

利用一元微积分可以算出0均值、方差为σ2\sigma^2σ2的单变量高斯分布的高阶矩：奇数阶矩为0，偶数阶比如2k2k2k阶矩为：

(2k−1)×(2k−3)...×3×1×σ2k(2k-1)\times (2k-3)...\times 3\times 1\times \sigma^{2k}(2k−1)×(2k−3)...×3×1×σ2k

为简化表示，定义 (2k−1)!!=(2k−1)×(2k−3)...×3×1=(2k−1)!2k(k−1)!(2k-1)!!=(2k-1)\times (2k-3)...\times 3\times 1=\frac{(2k-1)!}{2^k(k-1)!}(2k−1)!!=(2k−1)×(2k−3)...×3×1=2k(k−1)!(2k−1)!​，则单变量高斯分布的2k2k2k阶矩为：

(2k−1)!!σ2k(2k-1)!!\sigma^{2k}(2k−1)!!σ2k

如果是标准高斯分布，σ=1\sigma=1σ=1，则2k2k2k阶矩为(2k−1)!!(2k-1)!!(2k−1)!!。

设x1,x2,x3...xmx_{1},x_{2},x_{3}...x_{m}x1​,x2​,x3​...xm​分别都是服从一维标准高斯分布的随机变量且两两之间相互独立，则它们的组合变量服从均值为0、协方差矩阵为m×mm\times mm×m单位阵III的标准联合正态分布，即 for i=1,2,3...m,i≠j{E[xi]=0E[xi2]=1E[xixj]=0E[xi2k−1]=0E[xi2k]=(2k−1)!!(1)for\ i=1,2,3...m,i\neq j\begin{cases}E[x_i]=0\\E[x_i^2]=1\\E[x_ix_j]=0\\E[x_i^{2k-1}]=0\\E[x_i^{2k}]=(2k-1)!!\end{cases}\tag{1}for i=1,2,3...m,i=j⎩⎨⎧​E[xi​]=0E[xi2​]=1E[xi​xj​]=0E[xi2k−1​]=0E[xi2k​]=(2k−1)!!​(1)

更高阶的矩，如nnn阶矩的分量可表示如下：
E[xi1xi2...xin]in which: 1≤i1,i2...in≤mE[x_{i_1}x_{i_2}...x_{i_n}]\quad in\ which:\ 1\le i_1,i_2...i_n \le mE[xi1​​xi2​​...xin​​]in which: 1≤i1​,i2​...in​≤m
x\boldsymbol{x}x的分量可以重复出现多次，也可以不出现，比如可以有i1=i2=1i_1=i_2=1i1​=i2​=1。由此可以合并相同的分量写成幂形式，将高阶矩重新表示成：E[xi1xi2...xin]=E[x1α1x2α2...xmαm]in which: n=α1+α2+....+αm,1≤i1,i2...in≤mE[x_{i_1}x_{i_2}...x_{i_n}]=E[x_{1}^{\alpha_1}x_{2}^{\alpha_2}...x_{m}^{\alpha_m}]\\in\ which:\ n=\alpha_1+\alpha_2+....+\alpha_m,\quad 1\le i_1,i_2...i_n \le mE[xi1​​xi2​​...xin​​]=E[x1α1​​x2α2​​...xmαm​​]in which: n=α1​+α2​+....+αm​,1≤i1​,i2​...in​≤m
且由于不同的xix_ixi​之间相互独立，
E[x1α1x2α2...xmαm]=E[x1α1]E[x2α2]...E[xmαm]in which: n=α1+α2+....+αmE[x_{1}^{\alpha_1}x_{2}^{\alpha_2}...x_{m}^{\alpha_m}]=E[x_{1}^{\alpha_1}]E[x_{2}^{\alpha_2}]...E[x_{m}^{\alpha_m}]\\in\ which:\ n=\alpha_1+\alpha_2+....+\alpha_mE[x1α1​​x2α2​​...xmαm​​]=E[x1α1​​]E[x2α2​​]...E[xmαm​​]in which: n=α1​+α2​+....+αm​
而每个E[xiαi]E[x_{i}^{\alpha_i}]E[xiαi​​]可由式(1)得到，由此可计算nnn阶中心矩的所有分量。只有每个xix_ixi​的指数都是偶数的n阶矩分量是非0的。

3. 一般正态分布的高阶中心矩

本节中需要张量表示法，会用到第1节中的一些运算符号。

设y={y1,y2,y3...ym}T\boldsymbol{y}=\{y_{1},y_{2},y_{3}...y_{m}\}^Ty={y1​,y2​,y3​...ym​}T 是均值为0、协方差矩阵为m×mm\times mm×m的方阵PPP的服从联合高斯分布的一组随机变量，m×mm\times mm×m的方阵MMM是PPP的一个平方根(e.g., lower-triangular Cholesky factorization)，满足P=M⋅MT\boldsymbol{P}=\boldsymbol{M}\cdot\boldsymbol{M}^TP=M⋅MT（∑kMikMjk=Pij\sum_k{M_{ik}M_{jk}=P_{ij}}∑k​Mik​Mjk​=Pij​）， 则可以认为y\boldsymbol{y}y是由x\boldsymbol{x}x经矩阵MMM线性变换而来，即y=M⋅x\boldsymbol{y}=\boldsymbol{M}\cdot\boldsymbol{x}y=M⋅x（yi=∑jMijyjy_i=\sum_j{M_{ij}y_j}yi​=∑j​Mij​yj​），其中x\boldsymbol{x}x服从上节提到的标准联合正态分布，其协方差矩阵是III。

E[y]=E[M⋅x]=M⋅E[x]=0E[yiyj]=E[(Mi⋅x)(Mj⋅x)]=(MiMj)∗E[x2]=(MiMj)∗I=∑kMikMjk=Pijtherefore E[y2]=PE[\boldsymbol{y}]=E[\boldsymbol{M}\cdot\boldsymbol{x}]=\boldsymbol{M}\cdot E[\boldsymbol{x}]=0\\E[y_iy_j]=E[(\boldsymbol{M_i}\cdot\boldsymbol{x})(\boldsymbol{M_j}\cdot\boldsymbol{x})]=(\boldsymbol{M_i}\boldsymbol{M_j})*E[\boldsymbol{x}^2]=(\boldsymbol{M_i}\boldsymbol{M_j})*\boldsymbol{I}=\sum_k{M_{ik}M_{jk}}=P_{ij}\\therefore\ E[\boldsymbol{y}^2]=\boldsymbol{P}E[y]=E[M⋅x]=M⋅E[x]=0E[yi​yj​]=E[(Mi​⋅x)(Mj​⋅x)]=(Mi​Mj​)∗E[x2]=(Mi​Mj​)∗I=k∑​Mik​Mjk​=Pij​therefore E[y2]=P

我们来看y\boldsymbol{y}y的高阶矩，同样可以用两种形式写出来

E[y1α1y2α2...ymαm]=E[(M1⋅x)α1(M2⋅x)α2...(Mm⋅x)αm]=(M1α1M2α2...Mmαm)∗E[xn]in which: n=α1+α2+....+αmE[y_{1}^{\alpha_1}y_{2}^{\alpha_2}...y_{m}^{\alpha_m}]=E[(\boldsymbol{M_1}\cdot\boldsymbol{x})^{\alpha_1}(\boldsymbol{M_2}\cdot\boldsymbol{x})^{\alpha_2}...(\boldsymbol{M_m}\cdot\boldsymbol{x})^{\alpha_m}]=\\ (\boldsymbol{M_1}^{\alpha_1}\boldsymbol{M_2}^{\alpha_2}...\boldsymbol{M_m}^{\alpha_m})*E[\boldsymbol{x}^n]\\ in\ which:\ n=\alpha_1+\alpha_2+....+\alpha_mE[y1α1​​y2α2​​...ymαm​​]=E[(M1​⋅x)α1​(M2​⋅x)α2​...(Mm​⋅x)αm​]=(M1​α1​M2​α2​...Mm​αm​)∗E[xn]in which: n=α1​+α2​+....+αm​

或

E[yi1yi2...yin]=E[(Mi1⋅x)(Mi2⋅x)...(Min⋅x)]=(Mi1Mi2...Min)∗E[xn]in which:1≤i1,i2...in≤m;E[y_{i_1}y_{i_2}...y_{i_n}]=E[(\boldsymbol{M_{i_1}}\cdot\boldsymbol{x})(\boldsymbol{M_{i_2}}\cdot\boldsymbol{x})...(\boldsymbol{M_{i_n}}\cdot\boldsymbol{x})]=\\ (\boldsymbol{M_{i_1}}\boldsymbol{M_{i_2}}...\boldsymbol{M_{i_n}})*E[\boldsymbol{x}^n]\\in\ which:1\le i_1,i_2...i_n\le m;E[yi1​​yi2​​...yin​​]=E[(Mi1​​⋅x)(Mi2​​⋅x)...(Min​​⋅x)]=(Mi1​​Mi2​​...Min​​)∗E[xn]in which:1≤i1​,i2​...in​≤m;

将上式展开成分量求和形式即是：

(Mi1Mi2...Min)∗E[xn]=∑k1=1m∑k2=1m...∑kn=1mMi1k1Mi2k2...MinknE[xk1xk2...xkn]in which:1≤i1,i2...in,k1,k2,...kn≤m;(\boldsymbol{M_{i_1}}\boldsymbol{M_{i_2}}...\boldsymbol{M_{i_n}})*E[\boldsymbol{x}^n]=\\ \sum_{k_1=1}^{m}\sum_{k_2=1}^{m}...\sum_{k_n=1}^{m}{M_{i_1k_1}M_{i_2k_2}...M_{i_nk_n}E[x_{k_1}x_{k_2}...x_{k_n}]}\\in\ which:1\le i_1,i_2...i_n,k_1,k_2,...k_n\le m;(Mi1​​Mi2​​...Min​​)∗E[xn]=k1​=1∑m​k2​=1∑m​...kn​=1∑m​Mi1​k1​​Mi2​k2​​...Min​kn​​E[xk1​​xk2​​...xkn​​]in which:1≤i1​,i2​...in​,k1​,k2​,...kn​≤m;

对于奇数阶矩，即nnn为奇数时，因为E[xn]E[\boldsymbol{x}^n]E[xn]等于0，所以所有的E[yi1yi2...yin]E[y_{i_1}y_{i_2}...y_{i_n}]E[yi1​​yi2​​...yin​​]必然是0，E[yn]=0E[\boldsymbol{y}^n]=0E[yn]=0；

偶数阶矩则稍微复杂，下面只分析偶数阶矩，即n=2t (for t=1,2,3...)n=2t\ (for\ t=1,2,3...)n=2t (for t=1,2,3...)。

我们只需要考虑x\boldsymbol{x}x的n阶矩中非0的分量，即k1,k2,...knk_1,k_2,...k_nk1​,k2​,...kn​中每个数字都出现了偶数次的分量。如x\boldsymbol{x}x的6阶矩的某个非零分量为E[x1x1x1x1x2x2]E[x_1x_1x_1x_1x_2x_2]E[x1​x1​x1​x1​x2​x2​]（即k1,k2,...k6k_1,k_2,...k_6k1​,k2​,...k6​分别等于1,1,1,1,2,21,1,1,1,2,21,1,1,1,2,2），kkk下标中1出现了4次，2出现了两次，都是偶数次；

由于求和式的每一非0项中，每个kkk下标都会成对出现(准确得说是出现偶数次)，我们可以将每项中的Mi1k1,Mi2k2,...MinknM_{i_1k_1},M_{i_2k_2},...M_{i_nk_n}Mi1​k1​​,Mi2​k2​​,...Min​kn​​也进行两两分组，每一组中的两个数具有相同的kkk下标，（想一下：不同组的kkk下标一定不同吗？当然不是，有可能相同，后面会分析）

即：

∑k1=1m∑k2=1m...∑kn=1mMi1k1Mi2k2...MinknE[xk1xk2...xkn]=∑k1=1m∑k2=1m...∑kn=1m(Mil1kl1Mil2kl2)(Mil3kl3Mil4kl4)...(Mil(n−1)kl(n−1)Milnkln)E[(xkl1xkl2)(xkl3xkl4)...]\sum_{k_1=1}^{m}\sum_{k_2=1}^{m}...\sum_{k_n=1}^{m}{M_{i_1k_1}M_{i_2k_2}...M_{i_nk_n}E[x_{k_1}x_{k_2}...x_{k_n}]}=\\ \sum_{k_1=1}^{m}\sum_{k_2=1}^{m}...\sum_{k_n=1}^{m}{(M_{i_{l1}k_{l1}}M_{i_{l2}k_{l2}})(M_{i_{l3}k_{l3}}M_{i_{l4}k_{l4}})...(M_{i_{l(n-1)}k_{l(n-1)}}M_{i_{ln}k_{ln}})}E[(x_{k_{l1}}x_{k_{l2}})(x_{k_{l3}}x_{k_{l4}})...]k1​=1∑m​k2​=1∑m​...kn​=1∑m​Mi1​k1​​Mi2​k2​​...Min​kn​​E[xk1​​xk2​​...xkn​​]=k1​=1∑m​k2​=1∑m​...kn​=1∑m​(Mil1​kl1​​Mil2​kl2​​)(Mil3​kl3​​Mil4​kl4​​)...(Mil(n−1)​kl(n−1)​​Miln​kln​​)E[(xkl1​​xkl2​​)(xkl3​​xkl4​​)...]

其中：l=(l1,l2..ln)\boldsymbol{l}=(l1,l2..ln)l=(l1,l2..ln) 是 (1,2..n1,2..n1,2..n)的一个重排列，满足 (kl1=kl2,kl3=kl4...k_{l1}=k_{l2}, k_{l3}=k_{l4}...kl1​=kl2​,kl3​=kl4​...)

如果某一项的Mi∗k∗M_{i_*k_*}Mi∗​k∗​​中，每个kkk下标都正好只出现2次，那么对该项中所有的Mi∗k∗M_{i_*k_*}Mi∗​k∗​​进行两两分组的方式是唯一的，分完组后不同的组有不同的kkk下标，而且此时E[(xkl1xkl2)(xkl3xkl4)...]=1E[(x_{k_{l1}}x_{k_{l2}})(x_{k_{l3}}x_{k_{l4}})...]=1E[(xkl1​​xkl2​​)(xkl3​​xkl4​​)...]=1；

而如果某一项的Mi∗k∗M_{i_*k_*}Mi∗​k∗​​中，某些kkk下标出现了4次、6次、8次等，这时该项内Mi∗k∗M_{i_*k_*}Mi∗​k∗​​的分组方式就不唯一了。假如某个kkk下标kxk_xkx​在该项中出现了αx\alpha_xαx​次(αx\alpha_xαx​是偶数)，则该项中kkk下标等于kxk_xkx​的共αx\alpha_xαx​个Mi∗k∗M_{i_*k_*}Mi∗​k∗​​ ，共有(αx−1)!!(\alpha_x-1)!!(αx​−1)!!种两两分组的方式，而如果kkk下标共有sss个不同的数字，分别为(t1,t2...ts)(t_1,t_2...t_s)(t1​,t2​...ts​)，每个数字分别出现了α1,α2...αs\alpha_1,\alpha_2...\alpha_sα1​,α2​...αs​次(都是偶数)，则此时两两分组的方式共有 (α1−1)!!(α2−1)!!...(αs−1)!!(\alpha_1-1)!!(\alpha_2-1)!!...(\alpha_s-1)!!(α1​−1)!!(α2​−1)!!...(αs​−1)!!。巧的是，此时 E[(xkl1xkl2)(xkl3xkl4)...]=E[xt1α1xt2α2...xtsαs]=(α1−1)!!(α2−1)!!...(αs−1)!!E[(x_{k_{l1}}x_{k_{l2}})(x_{k_{l3}}x_{k_{l4}})...]=E[x_{t_1}^{\alpha_1}x_{t_2}^{\alpha_2}...x_{t_s}^{\alpha_s}]=(\alpha_1-1)!!(\alpha_2-1)!!...(\alpha_s-1)!!E[(xkl1​​xkl2​​)(xkl3​​xkl4​​)...]=E[xt1​α1​​xt2​α2​​...xts​αs​​]=(α1​−1)!!(α2​−1)!!...(αs​−1)!!

因此，原求和式每一非0项中的E[xk1xk2...xkn]E[x_{k_1}x_{k_2}...x_{k_n}]E[xk1​​xk2​​...xkn​​]都恰好代表该项中的Mi∗k∗M_{i_*k_*}Mi∗​k∗​​有多少种两两分组的方式！这也意味着，原求和式的所有非0项，正好遍历了将Mi∗k∗M_{i_*k_*}Mi∗​k∗​​按照kkk下标相同的原则两两分组相乘的结果，即

∑k1=1m∑k2=1m...∑kn=1mMi1k1Mi2k2...MinknE[xk1xk2...xkn]=∑k1=1m∑k2=1m...∑kn=1m{∑l1,l2...ln=reRange(1,2...n)AllDivideCases(Mil1kl1Mil2kl2)(Mil3kl3Mil4kl4)...(Mil(n−1)kl(n−1)Milnkln)}=∑l1,l2...ln=reRange(1,2...n)AllDivideCases∑kl1=kl2=1m∑kl3=kl4=1m...∑kl(n−1)=kln=1m(Mil1kl1Mil2kl2)(Mil3kl3Mil4kl4)...(Mil(n−1)kl(n−1)Milnkln)=∑l1,l2...ln=reRange(1,2...n)AllDivideCases(∑kl1=kl2=1mMil1kl1Mil2kl2)(∑kl3=kl4=1mMil3kl3Mil4kl4)...(∑kl(n−1)=kln=1mMil(n−1)kl(n−1)Milnkln)=∑l1,l2...ln=reRange(1,2...n)AllDivideCases(∑k=1mMil1kMil2k)(∑k=1mMil3kMil4k)(∑k=1mMil(n−1)kMilnk)=∑l1,l2...ln=reRange(1,2...n)AllDivideCasesPil1il2Pil3il4...Pil(n−1)iln\sum_{k_1=1}^{m}\sum_{k_2=1}^{m}...\sum_{k_n=1}^{m}{M_{i_1k_1}M_{i_2k_2}...M_{i_nk_n}E[x_{k_1}x_{k_2}...x_{k_n}]}=\\ \sum_{k_1=1}^{m}\sum_{k_2=1}^{m}...\sum_{k_n=1}^{m}\{ \sum_{l1,l2...ln=reRange(1,2...n)}^{All Divide Cases}{(M_{i_{l1}k_{l1}}M_{i_{l2}k_{l2}})(M_{i_{l3}k_{l3}}M_{i_{l4}k_{l4}})...(M_{i_{l(n-1)}k_{l(n-1)}}M_{i_{ln}k_{ln}})}\}=\\ \sum_{l1,l2...ln=reRange(1,2...n)}^{All Divide Cases}\sum_{k_{l1}=k_{l2}=1}^{m}\sum_{k_{l3}=k_{l4}=1}^{m}...\sum_{k_{l(n-1)}=k_{ln}=1}^{m}{(M_{i_{l1}k_{l1}}M_{i_{l2}k_{l2}})(M_{i_{l3}k_{l3}}M_{i_{l4}k_{l4}})...(M_{i_{l(n-1)}k_{l(n-1)}}M_{i_{ln}k_{ln}})}=\\ \sum_{l1,l2...ln=reRange(1,2...n)}^{All Divide Cases}{(\sum_{k_{l1}=k_{l2}=1}^{m}{M_{i_{l1}k_{l1}}M_{i_{l2}k_{l2}}})(\sum_{k_{l3}=k_{l4}=1}^{m}{M_{i_{l3}k_{l3}}M_{i_{l4}k_{l4}}})...(\sum_{k_{l(n-1)}=k_{ln}=1}^{m}{M_{i_{l(n-1)}k_{l(n-1)}}M_{i_{ln}k_{ln}}})}=\\ \sum_{l1,l2...ln=reRange(1,2...n)}^{All Divide Cases}{(\sum_{k=1}^{m}{M_{i_{l1}k}M_{i_{l2}k}})(\sum_{k=1}^{m}{M_{i_{l3}k}M_{i_{l4}k}})(\sum_{k=1}^{m}{M_{i_{l(n-1)}k}M_{i_{ln}k}})}=\\ \sum_{l1,l2...ln=reRange(1,2...n)}^{All Divide Cases}{P_{i_{l1}i_{l2}}P_{i_{l3}i_{l4}}...P_{i_{l(n-1)}i_{ln}}}k1​=1∑m​k2​=1∑m​...kn​=1∑m​Mi1​k1​​Mi2​k2​​...Min​kn​​E[xk1​​xk2​​...xkn​​]=k1​=1∑m​k2​=1∑m​...kn​=1∑m​{l1,l2...ln=reRange(1,2...n)∑AllDivideCases​(Mil1​kl1​​Mil2​kl2​​)(Mil3​kl3​​Mil4​kl4​​)...(Mil(n−1)​kl(n−1)​​Miln​kln​​)}=l1,l2...ln=reRange(1,2...n)∑AllDivideCases​kl1​=kl2​=1∑m​kl3​=kl4​=1∑m​...kl(n−1)​=kln​=1∑m​(Mil1​kl1​​Mil2​kl2​​)(Mil3​kl3​​Mil4​kl4​​)...(Mil(n−1)​kl(n−1)​​Miln​kln​​)=l1,l2...ln=reRange(1,2...n)∑AllDivideCases​(kl1​=kl2​=1∑m​Mil1​kl1​​Mil2​kl2​​)(kl3​=kl4​=1∑m​Mil3​kl3​​Mil4​kl4​​)...(kl(n−1)​=kln​=1∑m​Mil(n−1)​kl(n−1)​​Miln​kln​​)=l1,l2...ln=reRange(1,2...n)∑AllDivideCases​(k=1∑m​Mil1​k​Mil2​k​)(k=1∑m​Mil3​k​Mil4​k​)(k=1∑m​Mil(n−1)​k​Miln​k​)=l1,l2...ln=reRange(1,2...n)∑AllDivideCases​Pil1​il2​​Pil3​il4​​...Pil(n−1)​iln​​

对于nnn阶矩来说，求和式∑l1,l2...ln=reRange(1,2...n)AllDivideCases\sum_{l1,l2...ln=reRange(1,2...n)}^{All Divide Cases}∑l1,l2...ln=reRange(1,2...n)AllDivideCases​共有 (n−1)!!(n-1)!!(n−1)!!项。

综上，E[yi1yi2...yin]=∑l1,l2...ln=reRange(1,2...n)AllDivideCasesPil1il2Pil3il4...Pil(n−1)ilnE[y_{i_1}y_{i_2}...y_{i_n}]=\sum_{l1,l2...ln=reRange(1,2...n)}^{All Divide Cases}{P_{i_{l1}i_{l2}}P_{i_{l3}i_{l4}}...P_{i_{l(n-1)}i_{ln}}}E[yi1​​yi2​​...yin​​]=l1,l2...ln=reRange(1,2...n)∑AllDivideCases​Pil1​il2​​Pil3​il4​​...Pil(n−1)​iln​​

这个结论叫做 Isserlis’ theorem [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Isserlis'_theorem]

下面以四阶和六阶矩为例来演示结论

E[yiyjykyl]=PijPkl+PikPjl+PilPjkE[yiyiyjyk]=PiiPjk+PijPik+PikPij=PiiPjk+2PijPikE[yiyiyjyj]=PiiPjj+PijPij+PijPij=PiiPjj+2Pij2E[yiyiyiyj]=PiiPij+PiiPij+PijPii=3PiiPijE[yiyiyiyi]=PiiPii+PiiPii+PiiPii=3Pii2E[yiyjykylymyn]=PijPklPmn+PijPkmPln+PijPknPlm+PikPjlPmn+PikPjmPln+PikPjnPlm+PilPjkPmn+PilPjmPkn+PilPjnPkm+PimPjkPln+PimPjlPkn+PimPjnPlk+PinPjkPlm+PinPjlPkm+PinPjmPklE[y_iy_jy_ky_l]=P_{ij}P_{kl} + P_{ik}P_{jl} + P_{il}P_{jk}\\ E[y_iy_iy_jy_k] = P_{ii}P_{jk} + P_{ij}P_{ik} + P_{ik}P_{ij}=P_{ii}P_{jk}+2P_{ij}P_{ik}\\ E[y_iy_iy_jy_j] = P_{ii}P_{jj} + P_{ij}P_{ij} + P_{ij}P_{ij}=P_{ii}P_{jj}+2P_{ij}^2\\ E[y_iy_iy_iy_j]=P_{ii}P_{ij}+P_{ii}P_{ij}+P_{ij}P_{ii}=3P_{ii}P_{ij}\\ E[y_iy_iy_iy_i]=P_{ii}P_{ii}+P_{ii}P_{ii}+P_{ii}P_{ii}=3P_{ii}^2\\ E[y_iy_jy_ky_ly_my_n]=P_{ij}P_{kl}P_{mn} + P_{ij}P_{km}P_{ln} + P_{ij}P_{kn}P_{lm} +\\ P_{ik}P_{jl}P_{mn} + P_{ik}P_{jm}P_{ln} + P_{ik}P_{jn}P_{lm} +\\ P_{il}P_{jk}P_{mn} + P_{il}P_{jm}P_{kn} + P_{il}P_{jn}P_{km} +\\ P_{im}P_{jk}P_{ln} + P_{im}P_{jl}P_{kn} + P_{im}P_{jn}P_{lk} +\\ P_{in}P_{jk}P_{lm} + P_{in}P_{jl}P_{km} + P_{in}P_{jm}P_{kl}E[yi​yj​yk​yl​]=Pij​Pkl​+Pik​Pjl​+Pil​Pjk​E[yi​yi​yj​yk​]=Pii​Pjk​+Pij​Pik​+Pik​Pij​=Pii​Pjk​+2Pij​Pik​E[yi​yi​yj​yj​]=Pii​Pjj​+Pij​Pij​+Pij​Pij​=Pii​Pjj​+2Pij2​E[yi​yi​yi​yj​]=Pii​Pij​+Pii​Pij​+Pij​Pii​=3Pii​Pij​E[yi​yi​yi​yi​]=Pii​Pii​+Pii​Pii​+Pii​Pii​=3Pii2​E[yi​yj​yk​yl​ym​yn​]=Pij​Pkl​Pmn​+Pij​Pkm​Pln​+Pij​Pkn​Plm​+Pik​Pjl​Pmn​+Pik​Pjm​Pln​+Pik​Pjn​Plm​+Pil​Pjk​Pmn​+Pil​Pjm​Pkn​+Pil​Pjn​Pkm​+Pim​Pjk​Pln​+Pim​Pjl​Pkn​+Pim​Pjn​Plk​+Pin​Pjk​Plm​+Pin​Pjl​Pkm​+Pin​Pjm​Pkl​

4. 随机变量经非线性变换后的期望与协方差矩阵

设 x\boldsymbol{x}x 是均值为 x‾\boldsymbol{\overline{x}}x，协方差矩阵为 Pxx\boldsymbol{P_{xx}}Pxx​ 的多维随机变量，映射f\boldsymbol{f}f 可将x\boldsymbol{x}x映射为y\boldsymbol{y}y，且f\boldsymbol{f}f是解析的，即：
y=f(x)=f(x‾)+∇f(x‾)∗δx+12!∇2f(x‾)∗δx2+13!∇3f(x‾)∗δx3+14!∇4f(x‾)∗δx4+...in which:δx=x−x‾(1)\boldsymbol{y}=\boldsymbol{f}(\boldsymbol{x})=\\ \boldsymbol{f}(\boldsymbol{\overline{x}}) + \boldsymbol{\nabla f({\overline{x}})}*\boldsymbol{\delta x} + \frac{1}{2!}\boldsymbol{\nabla^2 f({\overline{x}})}*\boldsymbol{\delta x^2} + \frac{1}{3!}\boldsymbol{\nabla^3 f({\overline{x}})}*\boldsymbol{\delta x^3} + \frac{1}{4!}\boldsymbol{\nabla^4 f({\overline{x}})}*\boldsymbol{\delta x^4} + ...\\ in\ which:\boldsymbol{\delta x}=\boldsymbol{x} - \boldsymbol{\overline{x}}\tag{1}y=f(x)=f(x)+∇f(x)∗δx+2!1​∇2f(x)∗δx2+3!1​∇3f(x)∗δx3+4!1​∇4f(x)∗δx4+...in which:δx=x−x(1)
若y\boldsymbol{y}y是mmm维变量，x\boldsymbol{x}x是nnn维变量，则∇if(x‾)\boldsymbol{\nabla^i f({\overline{x}})}∇if(x)就是一个mmm行111列的张量矩阵，其元素都是iii阶nnn维张量，而δxi\boldsymbol{\delta x^i}δxi也是iii阶nnn维张量，因此∇if(x‾)∗δxi\boldsymbol{\nabla^i f({\overline{x}})}*\boldsymbol{\delta x^i}∇if(x)∗δxi退化为一个mmm行111列传统矩阵（矢量）。

y\boldsymbol{y}y的期望E[y]E[\boldsymbol{y}]E[y]为：
y‾=E[y]=E[f(x)]=f(x‾)+12!∇2f(x‾)∗Pxx+13!∇3f(x‾)∗E[δx3]+14!∇4f(x‾)∗E[δx4]+...\boldsymbol{\overline{y}} = E[\boldsymbol{y}] = E[\boldsymbol{f}(\boldsymbol{x})] = \\ \boldsymbol{f}(\boldsymbol{\overline{x}}) + \frac{1}{2!}\boldsymbol{\nabla^2 f({\overline{x}})}*\boldsymbol{P_{xx}} + \frac{1}{3!}\boldsymbol{\nabla^3 f({\overline{x}})}*E[\boldsymbol{\delta x^3}] + \frac{1}{4!}\boldsymbol{\nabla^4 f({\overline{x}})}*E[\boldsymbol{\delta x^4} ]+ ...y​=E[y]=E[f(x)]=f(x)+2!1​∇2f(x)∗Pxx​+3!1​∇3f(x)∗E[δx3]+4!1​∇4f(x)∗E[δx4]+...
上式中因为E[δx]=0E[\boldsymbol{\delta x}]=0E[δx]=0所以略去了∇f(x‾)∗E[δx]\boldsymbol{\nabla f({\overline{x}})}*E[\boldsymbol{\delta x}]∇f(x)∗E[δx]这一项，并用Pxx\boldsymbol{P_{xx}}Pxx​替换了E[δx2]E[\boldsymbol{\delta x^2}]E[δx2]。
y\boldsymbol{y}y的偏差δy\boldsymbol{\delta y}δy为：
δy=y−y‾=∇f(x‾)∗δx+12!∇2f(x‾)∗(δx2−Pxx)+13!∇3f(x‾)∗(δx3−E[δx3])+14!∇4f(x‾)∗(δx4−E[δx4])+...\boldsymbol{\delta y} = \boldsymbol{y}-\boldsymbol{\overline{y}} = \\ \boldsymbol{\nabla f({\overline{x}})}*\boldsymbol{\delta x} + \frac{1}{2!}\boldsymbol{\nabla^2 f({\overline{x}})}*(\boldsymbol{\delta x^2}-\boldsymbol{P_{xx}}) + \frac{1}{3!}\boldsymbol{\nabla^3 f({\overline{x}})}*(\boldsymbol{\delta x^3}-E[\boldsymbol{\delta x^3}]) + \frac{1}{4!}\boldsymbol{\nabla^4 f({\overline{x}})}*(\boldsymbol{\delta x^4}-E[\boldsymbol{\delta x^4}]) + ...δy=y−y​=∇f(x)∗δx+2!1​∇2f(x)∗(δx2−Pxx​)+3!1​∇3f(x)∗(δx3−E[δx3])+4!1​∇4f(x)∗(δx4−E[δx4])+...
偏差y\boldsymbol{y}y的张量平方δy2\boldsymbol{\delta y^2}δy2为：
δy2=δyδyT=(∇f(x‾)∗δx)(∇f(x‾)∗δx)T+12!(∇f(x‾)∗δx)[∇2f(x‾)∗(δx2−Pxx)]T+12![∇2f(x‾)∗(δx2−Pxx)](∇f(x‾)∗δx)T+13!(∇f(x‾)∗δx)[∇3f(x‾)∗(δx3−E[δx3])]T+13![∇3f(x‾)∗(δx3−E[δx3])](∇f(x‾)∗δx)T+12!2![∇2f(x‾)∗(δx2−Pxx)][∇2f(x‾)∗(δx2−Pxx)]T+...=(∇f(x‾)∇Tf(x‾))∗(δx)2+12!(∇f(x‾)∇2Tf(x‾))∗[(δx)(δx2−Pxx)]+12!(∇2f(x‾)∇Tf(x‾))∗[(δx2−Pxx)(δx)]+13!(∇f(x‾)∇3Tf(x‾))∗[(δx)(δx3−E[δx3])]+13!(∇3f(x‾)∇Tf(x‾))∗[(δx3−E[δx3])(δx)]+12!2!(∇2f(x‾)∇2Tf(x‾))∗(δx2−Pxx)2+...\boldsymbol{\delta y^2} =\boldsymbol{\delta y \delta y^T} = (\boldsymbol{\nabla f({\overline{x}})}*\boldsymbol{\delta x})(\boldsymbol{\nabla f({\overline{x}})}*\boldsymbol{\delta x})^T + \\ \frac{1}{2!}(\boldsymbol{\nabla f({\overline{x}})}*\boldsymbol{\delta x})[\boldsymbol{\nabla^2 f({\overline{x}})}*(\boldsymbol{\delta x^2}-\boldsymbol{P_{xx}})]^T +\\ \frac{1}{2!}[\boldsymbol{\nabla^2 f({\overline{x}})}*(\boldsymbol{\delta x^2}-\boldsymbol{P_{xx}})](\boldsymbol{\nabla f({\overline{x}})}*\boldsymbol{\delta x})^T +\\ \frac{1}{3!}(\boldsymbol{\nabla [(\boldsymbol{\delta x})(\boldsymbol{\delta x^2}-\boldsymbol{P_{xx}})] + \\ \frac{1}{2!}(\boldsymbol{\nabla^2 f({\overline{x}})} \boldsymbol{\nabla^{T} f({\overline{x}})}) * [(\boldsymbol{\delta y\boldsymbol{y}y的协方差E[δy2]E[\boldsymbol{\delta y^2}]E[δy2]为：
E[δy2]=E[δyδyT]=(∇f(x‾)∇Tf(x‾))∗E[(δx2)]+12!(∇f(x‾)∇2Tf(x‾))∗E[δx3−δxPxx]+12!(∇2f(x‾)∇Tf(x‾))∗E[δx3−Pxxδx]+13!(∇f(x‾)∇3Tf(x‾))∗E[δx4−δxE[δx3]]+13!(∇3f(x‾)∇Tf(x‾))∗E[δx4−E[δx3]δx]+12!2!(∇2f(x‾)∇2Tf(x‾))∗E[δx4−δx2Pxx−Pxxδx2+Pxx2]+...E[\boldsymbol{\delta y^2}] = E[\boldsymbol{\delta y \delta y^T}] = (\boldsymbol{\nabla f({\overline{x}})} \boldsymbol{\nabla^{T} f({\overline{x}})}) * E[(\boldsymbol{\delta x^2})] +\\ \frac{1}{2!}(\boldsymbol{\nabla f({\overline{x}})}\boldsymbol{\nabla^{2T} f({\overline{x}})}) * E[\boldsymbol{\delta x^3}-\boldsymbol{\delta x}\boldsymbol{P_{xx}}] + \\ \frac{1}{2!}(\boldsymbol{\nabla^2 f({\overline{x}})} \boldsymbol{\nabla^{T} f({\overline{x}})}) * E[\boldsymbol{\delta x^3}-\boldsymbol{P_{xx}}\boldsymbol{\delta x}] + \\ \frac{1}{3!}(\boldsymbol{\nabla f({\overline{x}})} \boldsymbol{\nabla^{3T} f({\overline{x}})})*E[\boldsymbol{\delta x^4}-\boldsymbol{\delta x}E[\boldsymbol{\delta x^3}]]+\\ \frac{1}{3!}(\boldsymbol{\nabla^3 f({\overline{x}})}\boldsymbol{\nabla^{T} f({\overline{x}})} )* E[\boldsymbol{\delta x^4}-E[\boldsymbol{\delta x^3}]\boldsymbol{\delta x}]+\\ \frac{1}{2!2!}(\boldsymbol{\nabla^2 f({\overline{x}})}\boldsymbol{\nabla^{2T} f({\overline{x}})})*E[\boldsymbol{\delta x^4}-\boldsymbol{\delta x^2}\boldsymbol{P_{xx}} - \boldsymbol{P_{xx}}\boldsymbol{\delta x^2} + \boldsymbol{P_{xx}}^2] + ...E[δy2]=E[δyδyT]=(∇f(x)∇Tf(x))∗E[(δx2)]+2!1​(∇f(x)∇2Tf(x))∗E[δx3−δxPxx​]+2!1​(∇2f(x)∇Tf(x))∗E[δx3−Pxx​δx]+3!1​(∇f(x)∇3Tf(x))∗E[δx4−δxE[δx3]]+3!1​(∇3f(x)∇Tf(x))∗E[δx4−E[δx3]δx]+2!2!1​(∇2f(x)∇2Tf(x))∗E[δx4−δx2Pxx​−Pxx​δx2+Pxx​2]+...
考虑到 E[δx]=0, E[(δx2)]=PxxE[\boldsymbol{\delta x}]=0,\ E[(\boldsymbol{\delta x^2})]=\boldsymbol{P_{xx}}E[δx]=0, E[(δx2)]=Pxx​，上式可进一步简化：
E[δy2]=(∇f(x‾)∇Tf(x‾))∗Pxx+12!(∇f(x‾)∇2Tf(x‾))∗E[δx3]+12!(∇2f(x‾)∇Tf(x‾))∗E[δx3]+13!(∇f(x‾)∇3Tf(x‾))∗E[δx4]+13!(∇3f(x‾)∇Tf(x‾))∗E[δx4]+12!2!(∇2f(x‾)∇2Tf(x‾))∗(E[δx4]−E[δx2]Pxx−PxxE[δx2]+Pxx2)+...=(∇f(x‾)∇Tf(x‾))∗Pxx+12(∇f(x‾)∇2Tf(x‾)+∇2f(x‾)∇Tf(x‾))∗E[δx3]+16(∇f(x‾)∇3Tf(x‾)+∇3f(x‾)∇Tf(x‾))∗E[δx4]+14(∇2f(x‾)∇2Tf(x‾))∗(E[δx4]−Pxx2)+...E[\boldsymbol{\delta y^2}] = (\boldsymbol{\nabla f({\overline{x}})} \boldsymbol{\nabla^{T} f({\overline{x}})}) * \boldsymbol{P_{xx}}+\\ \frac{1}{2!}(\boldsymbol{\nabla f({\overline{x}})}\boldsymbol{\nabla^{2T} f({\overline{x}})}) * E[\boldsymbol{\delta x^3}] + \\ \frac{1}{2!}(\boldsymbol{\nabla^2 f({\overline{x}})} \boldsymbol{\nabla^{T} f({\overline{x}})}) * E[\boldsymbol{\delta x^3}] + \\ \frac{1}{3!}(\boldsymbol{\nabla f({\overline{x}})} \boldsymbol{\nabla^{3T} f({\overline{x}})})*E[\boldsymbol{\delta x^4}]+\\ \frac{1}{3!}(\boldsymbol{\nabla^3 f({\overline{x}})}\boldsymbol{\nabla^{T} f({\overline{x}})} )* E[\boldsymbol{\delta x^4}]+\\ \frac{1}{2!2!}(\boldsymbol{\nabla^2 f({\overline{x}})}\boldsymbol{\nabla^{2T} f({\overline{x}})})*(E[\boldsymbol{\delta x^4}]- E[\boldsymbol{\delta x^2}]\boldsymbol{P_{xx}} - \boldsymbol{P_{xx}}E[\boldsymbol{\delta x^2}] +\boldsymbol{P_{xx}}^2) + ...=\\ (\boldsymbol{\nabla f({\overline{x}})} \boldsymbol{\nabla^{T} f({\overline{x}})}) * \boldsymbol{P_{xx}}+\\ \frac{1}{2}(\boldsymbol{\nabla f({\overline{x}})}\boldsymbol{\nabla^{2T} f({\overline{x}})} + \boldsymbol{\nabla^2 f({\overline{x}})} \boldsymbol{\nabla^{T} f({\overline{x}})}) * E[\boldsymbol{\delta x^3}] + \\ \frac{1}{6}(\boldsymbol{\nabla f({\overline{x}})} \boldsymbol{\nabla^{3T} f({\overline{x}})} + \boldsymbol{\nabla^3 f({\overline{x}})}\boldsymbol{\nabla^{T} f({\overline{x}})} )*E[\boldsymbol{\delta x^4}]+\\ \frac{1}{4}(\boldsymbol{\nabla^2 f({\overline{x}})}\boldsymbol{\nabla^{2T} f({\overline{x}})})*(E[\boldsymbol{\delta x^4}]-\boldsymbol{P_{xx}}^2) + ...E[δy2]=(∇f(x)∇Tf(x))∗Pxx​+2!1​(∇f(x)∇2Tf(x))∗E[δx3]+2!1​(∇2f(x)∇Tf(x))∗E[δx3]+3!1​(∇f(x)∇3Tf(x))∗E[δx4]+3!1​(∇3f(x)∇Tf(x))∗E[δx4]+2!2!1​(∇2f(x)∇2Tf(x))∗(E[δx4]−E[δx2]Pxx​−Pxx​E[δx2]+Pxx​2)+...=(∇f(x)∇Tf(x))∗Pxx​+21​(∇f(x)∇2Tf(x)+∇2f(x)∇Tf(x))∗E[δx3]+61​(∇f(x)∇3Tf(x)+∇3f(x)∇Tf(x))∗E[δx4]+41​(∇2f(x)∇2Tf(x))∗(E[δx4]−Pxx​2)+...
整理下结果就是：
E[y]=f(x‾)+12!∇2f(x‾)∗Pxx+13!∇3f(x‾)∗E[δx3]+14!∇4f(x‾)∗E[δx4]+...(2-a)E[\boldsymbol{y}] = \boldsymbol{f}(\boldsymbol{\overline{x}}) + \frac{1}{2!}\boldsymbol{\nabla^2 f({\overline{x}})}*\boldsymbol{P_{xx}} + \\ \frac{1}{3!}\boldsymbol{\nabla^3 f({\overline{x}})}*E[\boldsymbol{\delta x^3}] + \frac{1}{4!}\boldsymbol{\nabla^4 f({\overline{x}})}*E[\boldsymbol{\delta x^4} ]+ ...\tag{2-a}E[y]=f(x)+2!1​∇2f(x)∗Pxx​+3!1​∇3f(x)∗E[δx3]+4!1​∇4f(x)∗E[δx4]+...(2-a)
E[δy2]=(∇f(x‾)∇Tf(x‾))∗Pxx+12(∇f(x‾)∇2Tf(x‾)+∇2f(x‾)∇Tf(x‾))∗E[δx3]+16(∇f(x‾)∇3Tf(x‾)+∇3f(x‾)∇Tf(x‾))∗E[δx4]+14(∇2f(x‾)∇2Tf(x‾))∗(E[δx4]−Pxx2)+...(3-a)E[\boldsymbol{\delta y^2}] = (\boldsymbol{\nabla f({\overline{x}})} \boldsymbol{\nabla^{T} f({\overline{x}})}) * \boldsymbol{P_{xx}}+\\ \frac{1}{2}(\boldsymbol{\nabla f({\overline{x}})}\boldsymbol{\nabla^{2T} f({\overline{x}})} + \boldsymbol{\nabla^2 f({\overline{x}})} \boldsymbol{\nabla^{T} f({\overline{x}})}) * E[\boldsymbol{\delta x^3}] + \\ \frac{1}{6}(\boldsymbol{\nabla f({\overline{x}})} \boldsymbol{\nabla^{3T} f({\overline{x}})} + \boldsymbol{\nabla^3 f({\overline{x}})}\boldsymbol{\nabla^{T} f({\overline{x}})} )*E[\boldsymbol{\delta x^4}]+\\ \frac{1}{4}(\boldsymbol{\nabla^2 f({\overline{x}})}\boldsymbol{\nabla^{2T} f({\overline{x}})})*(E[\boldsymbol{\delta x^4}]-\boldsymbol{P_{xx}}^2) + ...\tag{3-a}E[δy2]=(∇f(x)∇Tf(x))∗Pxx​+21​(∇f(x)∇2Tf(x)+∇2f(x)∇Tf(x))∗E[δx3]+61​(∇f(x)∇3Tf(x)+∇3f(x)∇Tf(x))∗E[δx4]+41​(∇2f(x)∇2Tf(x))∗(E[δx4]−Pxx​2)+...(3-a)
对应的分量形式：
E[yi]=fi(x‾)+12!∇2fi(x‾)∗Pxx+13!∇3fi(x‾)∗E[δx3]+14!∇4fi(x‾)∗E[δx4]+...(2-b)E[y_i] = f_i(\boldsymbol{\overline{x}}) + \frac{1}{2!}\boldsymbol{\nabla^2} f_i(\boldsymbol{\overline{x}})*\boldsymbol{P_{xx}} + \\ \frac{1}{3!}\boldsymbol{\nabla^3} f_i(\boldsymbol{\overline{x}})*E[\boldsymbol{\delta x^3}] + \frac{1}{4!}\boldsymbol{\nabla^4}f_i(\boldsymbol{\overline{x}})*E[\boldsymbol{\delta x^4} ]+ ...\tag{2-b}E[yi​]=fi​(x)+2!1​∇2fi​(x)∗Pxx​+3!1​∇3fi​(x)∗E[δx3]+4!1​∇4fi​(x)∗E[δx4]+...(2-b)
E[yiyj]=(∇fi(x‾)∇fj(x‾))∗Pxx+12(∇fi(x‾)∇2fj(x‾)+∇2fi(x‾)∇fj(x‾))∗E[δx3]+16(∇fi(x‾)∇3fj(x‾)+∇3fi(x‾)∇fj(x‾))∗E[δx4]+14(∇2fi(x‾)∇2fj(x‾))∗(E[δx4]−Pxx2)+...(3-b)E[y_iy_j] = (\boldsymbol{\nabla} f_i(\boldsymbol{\overline{x}}) \boldsymbol{\nabla} f_j(\boldsymbol{\overline{x}})) * \boldsymbol{P_{xx}}+\\ \frac{1}{2}(\boldsymbol{\nabla} f_i(\boldsymbol{\overline{x}})\boldsymbol{\nabla^{2} f_j(\boldsymbol{\overline{x}})} + \boldsymbol{\nabla^2} f_i(\boldsymbol{\overline{x}})\boldsymbol{\nabla^{}} f_j(\boldsymbol{\overline{x}})) * E[\boldsymbol{\delta x^3}] + \\ \frac{1}{6}(\boldsymbol{\nabla} f_i(\boldsymbol{\overline{x}}) \boldsymbol{\nabla^{3}} f_j(\boldsymbol{\overline{x}}) + \boldsymbol{\nabla^3}f_i(\boldsymbol{\overline{x}})\boldsymbol{\nabla} f_j(\boldsymbol{\overline{x}}) )*E[\boldsymbol{\delta x^4}]+\\ \frac{1}{4}(\boldsymbol{\nabla^2} f_i(\boldsymbol{\overline{x}})\boldsymbol{\nabla^{2}} f_j(\boldsymbol{\overline{x}}))*(E[\boldsymbol{\delta x^4}]-\boldsymbol{P_{xx}}^2) + ...\tag{3-b}E[yi​yj​]=(∇fi​(x)∇fj​(x))∗Pxx​+21​(∇fi​(x)∇2fj​(x)+∇2fi​(x)∇fj​(x))∗E[δx3]+61​(∇fi​(x)∇3fj​(x)+∇3fi​(x)∇fj​(x))∗E[δx4]+41​(∇2fi​(x)∇2fj​(x))∗(E[δx4]−Pxx​2)+...(3-b)

如果通过先验知识已知随机变量 x\boldsymbol{x}x 的三阶(中心)矩为0（比如x\boldsymbol{x}x是中心对称分布的所有奇数阶矩都为0），则上式可直接去掉3阶项（甚至后续的所有奇数阶项），进一步简化为：
E[y]=y‾=f(x‾)+12!∇2f(x‾)∗Pxx+14!∇4f(x‾)∗E[δx4]+...(4-a)E[\boldsymbol{y}] =\boldsymbol{\overline{y}} = \boldsymbol{f}(\boldsymbol{\overline{x}}) + \frac{1}{2!}\boldsymbol{\nabla^2 f({\overline{x}})}*\boldsymbol{P_{xx}} + \frac{1}{4!}\boldsymbol{\nabla^4 f({\overline{x}})}*E[\boldsymbol{\delta x^4} ]+ ...\tag{4-a}E[y]=y​=f(x)+2!1​∇2f(x)∗Pxx​+4!1​∇4f(x)∗E[δx4]+...(4-a)
E[δy2]=(∇f(x‾)∇Tf(x‾))∗Pxx+16(∇f(x‾)∇3Tf(x‾)+∇3f(x‾)∇Tf(x‾))∗E[δx4]+14(∇2f(x‾)∇2Tf(x‾))∗(E[δx4]−Pxx2)+...(5-a)E[\boldsymbol{\delta y^2}] = (\boldsymbol{\nabla f({\overline{x}})} \boldsymbol{\nabla^{T} f({\overline{x}})}) * \boldsymbol{P_{xx}} + \\ \frac{1}{6}(\boldsymbol{\nabla f({\overline{x}})} \boldsymbol{\nabla^{3T} f({\overline{x}})} + \boldsymbol{\nabla^3 f({\overline{x}})}\boldsymbol{\nabla^{T} f({\overline{x}})} )*E[\boldsymbol{\delta x^4}]+\\ \frac{1}{4}(\boldsymbol{\nabla^2 f({\overline{x}})}\boldsymbol{\nabla^{2T} f({\overline{x}})})*(E[\boldsymbol{\delta x^4}]-\boldsymbol{P_{xx}}^2) + ...\tag{5-a}E[δy2]=(∇f(x)∇Tf(x))∗Pxx​+61​(∇f(x)∇3Tf(x)+∇3f(x)∇Tf(x))∗E[δx4]+41​(∇2f(x)∇2Tf(x))∗(E[δx4]−Pxx​2)+...(5-a)
对应的分量形式：
E[yi]=fi(x‾)+12!∇2fi(x‾)∗Pxx+14!∇4fi(x‾)∗E[δx4]+...(4-b)E[y_i] = f_i(\boldsymbol{\overline{x}}) + \frac{1}{2!}\boldsymbol{\nabla^2} f_i(\boldsymbol{\overline{x}})*\boldsymbol{P_{xx}} + \frac{1}{4!}\boldsymbol{\nabla^4}f_i(\boldsymbol{\overline{x}})*E[\boldsymbol{\delta x^4} ]+ ...\tag{4-b}E[yi​]=fi​(x)+2!1​∇2fi​(x)∗Pxx​+4!1​∇4fi​(x)∗E[δx4]+...(4-b)
